description.en: Website that takes data from Instagram's public profile views and puts it into a friendlier page
description.fr: Site Web qui prend les données de profil public d'Instagram et les met dans une page plus conviviale

help.en: If enabled, Bibliogram will be accessible by people who do not have an account. This can be changed later via the webadmin.
